name: Shotgun
content: Shotguns impact with tremendous force at close range, but this stopping power diminishes rapidly further out. Shotguns do +3 damage if fired at targets within 10 feet. At long range, they inflict half damage. If you roll a critical hit, the target is knocked @Compendium[combat-utility-belt.conditionsdnd5e.ekm4TUHKT3QUPdPv]{Prone}.
